items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to size
items.body: Cute sweater as pictured Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sweater was cute - but has weird stitching.
items.body: Cute but has a weird red stitching you can see all around the bow. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars It’s definitely a winter sweater
items.body: Order one size larger Read more
items.author: Bob Kavanaugh

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Bow color not accurately depicted
items.body: I chose khaki colored and the sizing is correct. I wear a medium but sometimes large and medium fit well. Unfortunately the bow in the listing pictures looks dark brown and in real life it's much lighter in color than it shows, just like a dark khaki instead of dark brown which really takes away from the neat contrast I liked. The sweater is okay, not great quality Read more
items.author: heatherrichardson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish Lightweight Sweater—Perfect for Breezy Days
items.body: My wife received this and requested a size L after checking the sizing chart, and it fits just the way she wanted—slightly relaxed without being baggy. She was looking for something lightweight to toss on during those cooler spring and summer days when a full jacket is too much, but you still want a bit of coverage and style. This sweater checks all the boxes. The material is soft and breathable, not too thick, and drapes nicely. It’s cozy without being heavy, making it ideal for layering over a tank or tee. The contrast trim gives it a pop of style that stands out, and the bow knot detail on the back adds a touch of charm that elevates it from your average pullover. She’s already worn it a few times—to the office, out for coffee, and on a casual dinner date—and it’s gotten compliments each time. It pairs easily with jeans, skirts, or even shorts on a breezy day. Cute, comfy, and polished—it’s the kind of top that quickly becomes a go-to. Read more
items.author: John P Nimitz

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars On Trend
items.body: This sweater is so pretty and a great in-between weight. It is soft and comfortable to wear. The bow design and hem areas are so cute. It fits true to size. Read more
items.author: Sean

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute Sweater
items.body: This sweater is so cute. The color is exactly as described. I wish it was a little longer but that's just because of my body shape. The detail on the cuffs and bottom are a nice touch. Read more
items.author: Sara2000

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classic sweater, very versatile and cute!
items.body: This sweater is beautiful! It will fit my 13-year-old daughter, who wears a women’s size 2, as an oversized sweater, and my 18-year-old daughter, who wears a women’s size 4, as a regular fit. The length is very good, and the white stitching on black fabric adds an extra detail that elevates the sweater's overall look. Additionally, it pairs well with jeans, pants, or a skirt, making it a very versatile piece. Read more
items.author: Rebecca

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Pink, White. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
